meanings.definition: A type of fish found in tropical and subtropical waters.
meanings.sent1: The colorful wrasses swam gracefully in the clear ocean.
meanings.sent2: We saw many wrasses while snorkeling in the warm sea.
meanings.sent3: The wrasses decided to have a race to see who was the fastest swimmer.
meanings.sent4: The wrasses danced in the water, their fins moving like delicate fans.
meanings.sent5: The wrasses shimmered like rainbows under the sunlight, a beautiful sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: Look at all the wrasses swimming together in the coral reef.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen caught a net full of wrasses.
meanings.sent3: The wrasses gathered for a group photo, each one posing differently.
meanings.sent4: The wrasses in the aquarium were a vibrant bunch, each one with its own personality.
meanings.sent5: The wrasses darted around the rocks, their colors blending in with the surroundings.
